entry.title: Spray Nine C26822 ~ Spray Nine Heavy-Duty Cleaner and Disinfectant (650 ml) Kills Viruses!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spray Nine
Type: Heavy Duty Cleaner
Price: 5.95

[shortdesc]

IN STOCK NOW

  • Tough on Grease and Grime
  • Kills Viruses in 30 sec.
  • Kills Bacteria in 45 sec.
  • Biodegradable

    • Easy removal of Grease, Carbon Soils, Dirt & Mud, Scuff Marks, Carpet Stains, Ink, Mold & Mildew, Yellowing, Brake Dust, Tar, Road grime, Soot & Ash, Oils and Bug Splatter.

    Spray Nine's incredible dirt-busting power tackles the toughest cleaning jobs other products can't touch.  Spray nine cuts through stubborn grease, grime and hard-to -remove soils.  Spray Nine kills viruses and bacteria.  cleans and disinfects hard non-porous surfaces such as: counter tops, floors, walls, siding, ceramics, patio furniture, BBQ's, sporting equipment, motors, fiberglass, vinyl, rubber, plastic, metal and more.

    For Covid-19 related products click here!

    [/shortdesc] [additional]

    Contact Time Required to Kill Viruses, Bacteria and Fungus

    [/additional]

    Product listed on Health Canada. To check, click here! (DIN 02160331)

     

    Spray Nine Kills: H1N1 Swine Flu Virus, Influenza A2 Virus, Common Flu A2 Virus, Avian Flu H3N3 Virus, Salmonella Choleraesuis, Escherichia coli (E.coli), Hepatitis C Virus, Rhinovirus Type 37, Norwalk Virus,  Herpes Simplex I and II, Poliovirus Type I, Rotavirus, MRSA, Streptococcus pyogenes, Shigella dysenteriae 

    brlogen

entry.title: 3M NOVEC CONTACT CLNR - 3M Novec Contact Cleaner Plus, 325.31 mL (11 oz), can, 6 per pack NOVEC CONTACT CLNR 7100079667
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 23.97

[shortdesc]

3M Novec Contact Cleaner Plus, 325.31 mL (11 oz), can, 6 per pack

  • New 3M™ Novec™ Contact Cleaner/Lubricant quickly penetrates and flushes away light oils and greases from sensitive electrical and electronic equipment including: avionics, electro-mechanical devices, electrical contacts, connectors and switches.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Extra Product Information

  • Effectively removes fluorinated oils and greases
  • It also leaves a thin protective silicone coating
  • 3M™ Novec™ Contact Cleaner/Lubricant is compatible with plastics and other materials of construction
  • An effective aerosol, electronics cleaning solution.

    • Product Information

  • Cleans and lubricates
  • Non-flammable
  • Excellent plastics compatibility
  • Non conductive, non-corrosive
  • Meets MIL-PRF 29608A (Class L
  • Low toxicity degreasing fluid
  • Low Global Warming Potential and contains no HCFCs, HFCs, nPB or HAPs
    		•

entry.title: 3M 8968 - Glass Cleaner 08968 19 Oz (538.64 G) 7000142673
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Cleaners
Price: 7.16

[shortdesc]

3M Glass Cleaner, 08968, 19 oz (538.64 g)

  • 3M™ Glass Cleaner is an aerosol cleaner that is intended for all glass surfaces including windows, windshields, mirrors, and side glass, providing a streak-free shine
  • 3M™ Glass Cleaner's no-drip foaming action clings to vertical surfaces, and is safe for tinted and non-tinted windows, plastic, chrome and metal
  • It may also be used to clean automotive vinyl, interior plastic and clear plastic
  • The 3M™ Glass Cleaner is non-flammable and will not affect painted surfaces.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Cleaners

    Product Information

  • No-drip foaming action
  • Provides a streak-free shine
  • Non-flammable and will not affect painted surfaces
  • Liquid consistency

    • Suggested Application

  • Intended for all glass surfaces including windows, windshields, mirrors, and side glass, providing a streak-free shine
